DragonSoul

Brief: Immerse yourself in the enthralling realm of DragonSoul, where the forces of good clash with the nefarious dragon, Umlaut. Within this vibrant fantasy setting, heroes once trapped within Soulstones now depend on your valor and strategy to be freed. Wield your weapon, rally alongside the surviving champions, and embark on a quest to vanquish evil, liberate the captive heroes, and restore peace. Embrace the Easter update that introduces a freshly sprung world brimming with awe and unexpected delights.
